project.name: Academic Recommendation System
project.description: AI-powered recommendation system for university students using collaborative filtering and performance prediction

sprints.name: Sprint 1 - Analysis & Design
sprints.goal: Complete system analysis, create UML diagrams, design UI mockups, and define database schema

sprints.name: Sprint 2 - Data & ML Pipeline
sprints.goal: Implement data cleaning, feature engineering, train ML models, and evaluate performance

sprints.name: Sprint 3 - Backend Development
sprints.goal: Develop backend API with Python ML bridge, implement REST endpoints, and setup database

sprints.name: Sprint 4 - Frontend & Testing
sprints.goal: Build frontend UI with visualizations, integrate with backend, test complete system, and create documentation

epics.name: System Architecture & Design
epics.description: Define system architecture, create design documents, UML diagrams, and UI mockups

epics.name: ML Pipeline Development
epics.description: Build complete ML pipeline with data cleaning, feature engineering, model training, and evaluation

epics.name: Backend API Development
epics.description: Create REST API with NestJS, implement Python bridge, setup database, and create endpoints

epics.name: Frontend Development
epics.description: Build Vue 3 frontend with data visualizations, student management, and analytics dashboard

epics.name: Testing & Documentation
epics.description: Test complete system, write user documentation, create deployment guide, and generate reports

userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to create student profiles with demographic and academic information so that the system can generate personalized recommendations
acceptanceCriteria: Can input student name, email, age, gender, major
Can input academic data: GPA, semester, attendance rate, study hours
Form validation for required fields and data ranges
Profile saved to database successfully
Confirmation message displayed after creation

userStories.description: As a student, I want to receive personalized course/topic recommendations based on my profile and preferences so that I can make informed academic decisions
acceptanceCriteria: System generates recommendations using collaborative filtering
Recommendations consider student performance and demographics
Top 10 recommendations displayed with confidence scores
Recommendations stored in database with timestamp
Can view recommendation history

userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to view, update, and delete student academic data so that I can maintain accurate records
acceptanceCriteria: Can view list of all students with key information
Can search and filter students
Can update student information
Can delete student records
Changes reflected immediately in UI

userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to see visual representations of recommendation data and student distributions so that I can understand system performance and trends
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays key metrics: total students, recommendations, avg scores
Line chart shows recommendation trends over time
Bar charts show student distribution by GPA and gender
Table displays top recommended items with popularity metrics
All visualizations update in real-time

userStories.description: As a data scientist, I want to evaluate the ML model performance using standard metrics so that I can assess recommendation quality
acceptanceCriteria: Training pipeline generates evaluation metrics
Metrics include: precision, recall, F1-score, NDCG
Feature importance analysis available
Model performance saved to results folder
Evaluation report generated automatically

tasks.summary: Design database schema for students table
tasks.description: Create entity relationship diagram and SQL schema for students table with all required fields

tasks.summary: Create UML class diagram for Student entity
tasks.description: Design Student class with attributes and methods

tasks.summary: Design UI mockup for student profile form
tasks.description: Create wireframe and high-fidelity mockup for student creation form
Create Python script to clean all datasets: ITM-Rec, Student Performance, Knowledge Tracing
Create derived features, encode categoricals, normalize numerical features
Implement item-based CF with cosine similarity, train on ITM-Rec dataset
Implement Random Forest classifier for student performance prediction
Calculate precision, recall, F1, NDCG, and generate evaluation report
Initialize NestJS project, configure TypeScript, setup modules
Define TypeORM entity for students with all fields
Create REST endpoints: POST, GET, PATCH, DELETE for students

tasks.summary: Create Flask API for ML predictions
tasks.description: Build Flask API that loads models and serves predictions
Create ML service that communicates with Flask API via HTTP
Build endpoints for generating and retrieving recommendations
Create endpoints for overview stats, trends, and distributions
Initialize Vue 3 + Vite + TypeScript, configure routing and state management
Build axios-based API client for all backend endpoints
Create dashboard with stats cards, line chart for trends, and tables
Create student list, add/edit forms, and recommendation generation UI
Create analytics page with distribution charts and item popularity table
Create professional dark theme with design tokens and TailwindCSS v4
Document installation, setup, usage, and API endpoints
Document folder structure, architecture, and data flow
Document algorithms used, data cleaning pipeline, and evaluation metrics
Create JSON export with all sprints, epics, user stories, and tasks
Verify data flow from frontend through backend to ML models and back
Write step-by-step guide for deploying on local machine

backlog.description: Implement JWT-based authentication for securing endpoints
Add WebSocket support for real-time recommendation updates
Implement model versioning system to track different model versions
Add A/B testing capability to compare different recommendation algorithms
Allow exporting recommendations and analytics data to CSV/PDF
